Changing a View Name or Description

Root views initially are assigned the same name as the project. If you have the appropriate privileges, however, you can change the name and description of the root view or its children.

To change a view name or description:

  1. Select View > Properties from the menu bar. The View Properties dialog opens.

  2. Select the Info tab.

  3. Enter a new name in the Name text box.

  4. Enter a new name in the Description text box.

  5. Click OK.
